message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product.  I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to you. To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $2,200,000.  I believe this reflects the true worth of its capabilities.
I appreciate your starting offer, but I'm looking to make a more substantial discount. I'm willing to pay $1,600,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand your desired price point, the value this product brings justifies a higher investment. I'm willing to come down to $1,950,000. I believe this is a fair and reasonable offer.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,800,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this. Let's find a solution that works for both of us. I'm willing to come down to $1,875,000, which is a significant compromise on my end. I believe this is my final offer, as it reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to offer $1,700,000 for the product, which is the highest I'm willing to go.
